sentences.english: Stir the coffee to settle the grounds .
sentences.chinese: 把咖啡搅一搅好让渣滓沉淀。

sentences.english: The dregs settled and the liquid became clear.
sentences.chinese: 渣滓沉淀下来，液体变清了。

sentences.english: The park is covered with old ca fantastics around with forms of garbage.
sentences.chinese: 公园里随地都是旧罐头盒和其它各种渣滓。

sentences.english: They were thought as complete junks.
sentences.chinese: 它们被以为是彻头彻尾的渣滓。

sentences.english: The ground cloth or garbage bag is important only in that it makes cleaning up the fire much easier.
sentences.chinese: 使用地席或者渣滓袋只是为了更利便地清除火堆。

sentences.english: Automatic portion and garpouche collection every bisexualt but elimingots resource leaks in progr'ms.
sentences.chinese: 主动分配合渣滓回收防守程序中资源宣泄。

sentences.english: Most university trashes are characterized by their background of the upper middle class.
sentences.chinese: 那些大学里的渣滓，大多出身于中产阶级的上层。

sentences.english: Take away the dross from the silver, and there shall come forth a vessel for the finer.
sentences.chinese: 除去银子的渣滓，就有银子出来，银匠能以作器皿。

sentences.english: This old computer is just plain junk.
sentences.chinese: 这台老电脑纯正就是一堆渣滓。

sentences.english: Thou hast made us as the offscouring and refuse in the midst of the people.
sentences.chinese: 你使我们在万民中成为污秽和渣滓。

sentences.english: Remove the dross from the silver, and out comes material for the silversmith;
sentences.chinese: 除去银子的渣滓，就有银子出来，银匠能以做器皿。

sentences.english: The pomace then at the bottom of the vat is completely drained.
sentences.chinese: 然后在底层的渣滓，是完全的增值税流失。

sentences.english: Don't hang around with that kind of scum.
sentences.chinese: 别和那些社会渣滓混在一起。

sentences.english: These so-called football supporters are scum.
sentences.chinese: 这些所谓的球迷是社会渣滓。

sentences.english: Only when the dust being cleared out, the buds of evil being cut can one see the original.
sentences.chinese: 须是涤尽渣滓，斩绝萌芽，才见本来真体。
